Title: Help Me
Writer: Jeremy Slater (created by), William Peter Blatty (inspired by the novel by), David Grimm, David Grimm (story editor), Alyssa Clark (story editor)
Actors: Alfonso Herrera, Ben Daniels, Zuleikha Robinson, Kurt Egyiawan
Plot: Marcus and Tomas face an adversary like none they've fought before as the exorcism begins.
